GK19govass_u:1527: saṃvṛṇu bāṣpa-jalaṃ sakhi dṛśam uparajyāñjanena valayainām /
GK19govass_u:1528: dayitaḥ paśyatu pallava-paṅkajayor yugapad eva rucam //GAss_683//
GK19govass_u:1529: sā pāṇḍu-durbalāṅgī nayasi tvaṃ yatra yāti tatraiva /
GK19govass_u:1531: sakhi viśva-gañjanīyā lakṣmīr iva kamala-mukhi kadaryasya /
GK19govass_u:1536: hṛdayajñayā gavākṣe visadṛkṣaṃ kim api kūjitaṃ sakhyā /
GK19govass_u:1537: yat kalaha-bhinna-talpā bhaya-kapaṭād eti māṃ sutanu //GAss_686//
GK19govass_u:1538: harati hṛdayaṃ śalākā-nihito 'ñjana-tantur eṣa sakhi mugdhe /
GK19govass_u:1540: hasasi caraṇa-prahāre talpād apasārito bhuvi svapiṣi /
GK19govass_u:1541: nāsadṛśe'pi kṛte priya mama hṛdayāt tvaṃ viniḥsarasi //GAss_688//
GK19govass_u:1542: hasati sapatnī śvaśrū roditi vadanaṃ ca pidadhate sakhyaḥ /
GK19govass_u:1547: aruṇas tapana-śilām iva punar na māṃ bhasmatāṃ nayati //GAss_691//
GK19govass_u:1548: hṛtvā taṭini taraṅgair bhramitaś cakreṣu nāśaye nihitaḥ /
GK19govass_u:1555: kṣīrasya tu dayitatvaṃ yato 'pi śāntopacāram āsādya /
GK19govass_u:1557: kṣāntam apasārito yac caraṇāv upadhāya supta evāsi /
GK19govass_u:1558: udghāṭayasi kim ūru niḥśvāsaiḥ pulakayann uṣṇaiḥ //GAss_695//
GK19govass_u:1559: kṣudrodbhavasya kaṭutāṃ prakaṭayato yac chataś ca madam uccaiḥ /
GK19govass_u:1560: madhuno laghu-puruṣasya ca garimā laghimā ca bhedāya //GAss_696// **********************************************************
GK19govass_u:1563: vāg-devīṃ bhajato mama santaḥ paśyantu ko doṣaḥ //GAss_697//
GK19govass_u:1565: kasya na janayati harṣaṃ sat-kāvyaṃ madhura-vacanaṃ ca //GAss_698//
